extras.optText:
##### Content Watch How-To

This template uses the *Browser > Get Value* node to test if a content
of a webpage changed.

Follow these steps to test this template;

**1.** Edit the Config Node

**2.** Set the msg.url, msg.selector and msg.initialValue

Here is a [link](https://stackoverflow.com/a/42194160) to help finding 
out the selector of a content. And this [cheatsheet](https://devhints.io/xpath)
can also help.
